item.title: Chinese Tech Giants' Results Reflect Lackluster Economic Recovery
item.description: Chinese Tech Giants’ Results Reflect Lackluster Economic Recovery Chinese tech giants Alibaba, Tencent, and Baidu all reported mixed results for the first quarter of 2023. Alibaba’s revenue missed expectations, while Tencent and Baidu saw more marked upturns. The lackluster results reflect the broader slowdown in the Chinese economy, as well as the government’s crackdown on tech companies.
